summary: This mod removes the 250 gold interest cap in the bank, allowing players to accrue a potentially unlimited amount of interest.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][color=#f6b26b][size=5]REQUIRES ENDERAL
[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77868/]Get Enderal here[/url]

This mod removes the 250 gold interest cap in the bank, allowing players to accrue a nearly unlimited amount of interest.

This mod also makes a slight change to how interest is calculated over game time. Interest is now properly counted every day. Used to be if you waited more than 24 hours, that counted only as 1 24/hour cycle for the bank. With this mod, you get paid for every day.

[b][color=#f6b26b][size=5][u]INCLUDES
[/u][/size][/color][/b]
A script that replaces a script already in the game. Shouldn't make a significant difference.

An ESP that changes the bank message reminding you that the limit is 250. It's not essential.
author: Roro
